data.title: Great time in the Time Machine Room
data.text: My son found this place and we signed up to do it the next day. I had never heard of escape rooms before but thought I'd give it a try. We had a great time. You get to use your mind and in addition, it requires team work, and it makes you not dismiss anything that could be helpful. I would highly recommend this for family fun, birthdays, work outings, etc.

owner_response.author: Mark C, Owner at Escapeology, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Alan,

Thank you so much for taking to time to review us!  We are so glad you enjoyed your "Time" ;).

Regards,
Mark and Heather
Owners, Escapeology
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fun
data.text: We did antidote and escaped alive with 7 minutes to spare. Had a great time.  Thank you Becca and Alissa.

data.title: We didn't escape! Maybe next time!
data.text: My parents were in town, and we were looking for something fun to do as a family. Escapeology was the perfect choice! We participated as a party of 7 with my parents and 3 teenage children. The escape room was so engaging and kept everyone on their toes as we searched for and matched up clues and puzzles that we found. I loved seeing the whole family (3 generations) working together to escape. We didn't escape, but we had such a fun time! I highly recommend Escapeology for social events, a night out with friends, birthday parties, and corporate events. I'm actually trying to see if I can get a team outing at work together to do this. It's an awesome team building event.

owner_response.author: Grace G, Manager at Escapeology, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank for your review, and we're so glad you had fun with your family and see the value in us for team-building events!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Something Different for the Family
data.text: Lock me up and throw away the key.  Now we have to figure out a way out and the time is ticking away.  I entered this escape room thinking it would be something like the start of the second MazeRunner book the Scorch Trials, but no Rat Man appeared and we were on our own to decipher clues to find a way out.  Look everywhere, think outside the box and with luck you too with succeed.  My 11 year old even had a blast and was able to help with more clues then expected.

owner_response.author: Grace G, Manager at Escapeology, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for your fun, creative review!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fun!
data.text: This was our first experience with an escape room and we didn't know what to expect.  It was a lot of fun, but we did need to think a lot and work together.  We did didn't quite get out in time, but we were close!

owner_response.author: Grace G, Manager at Escapeology, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We're glad Escapeology gave you a fun first escape room experience! Thank you so much for your review.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fun but challenging
data.text: This was my first experience at an escape room and my family had a great time!  We had fun, but had to do quite a bit of thinking as well.  I would recommend this to families with older children.  It was something different to do with my grandkids that we all enjoyed.

owner_response.author: Grace G, Manager at Escapeology, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your very informative review! We're glad you had such a fun time with your family on your adventure at Escapeology!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
